long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Chrome web extension is a powerful tool for GitLab users. It allows you to easily view and manage your assigned issues and their statuses, all within your browser. With our extension, you'll be able to see a table of all users and their assigned issues, along with the current status of each issue. This powerful feature makes it easy to keep track of your work and stay organized. To use our extension, you'll need to provide a GitLab token, which allows our extension to access your GitLab account and retrieve the necessary information. So, if you're looking for an easy and efficient way to manage your GitLab issues, our Chrome web extension is the perfect solution.
